      Welcome!

      My name is Noah and I am a Ph.D. student in the Department of Linguistics at the University of California-Los Angeles, where I am an NSF Graduate Research Fellow (NSF DGE-2034835). Before this, I graduated summa cum laude with B.A.s in Linguistics, Eurasian Studies, and Russian from the University of Oklahoma, where I was a National Merit Scholar and Global Engagement Fellow.
